NoAppsDescription: Connected applications will appear here for easy single sign-on access.
LogoutConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to log out?
LogoutSuccessMessage: You have been successfully logged out.
AccessDeniedMessage: You do not have permission to access this resource.
PrivacyDescription: Use this page to detail your site's privacy policy.
ErrorOccurred: An error occurred while processing your request.
DevelopmentDescription1: Swapping to the Development environment displays detailed information about the error that occurred.
DevelopmentDescription2: The Development environment shouldn't be enabled for deployed applications. It can result in displaying sensitive information from exceptions to end users. For local debugging, enable the Development environment by setting the ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT environment variable to Development and restarting the app.
DisconnectAppConfirm: Are you sure you want to disconnect this application? You will need to authorize it again on next login.
ManageProfile: Manage your profile, two-step verification, and password settings
ConfirmSwitchAccount: Are you sure you want to switch to account {0}?
SwitchAccountError: An error occurred while switching accounts
CreateClientDescription: Register a new OAuth/OIDC client application
ConfigureScopesDescription: Define the scopes your clients can request
IntegrateApplicationDescription: Connect your application using the client credentials
PasswordTooShort: Passwords must be at least {0} characters.
PasswordRequiresNonAlphanumeric: Passwords must have at least one non alphanumeric character.
PasswordRequiresDigit: Passwords must have at least one digit ('0'-'9').
PasswordRequiresLower: Passwords must have at least one lowercase ('a'-'z').
PasswordRequiresUpper: Passwords must have at least one uppercase ('A'-'Z').
mfa.gracePeriodMessage: Mandatory MFA setup is required. You can skip this for {days} more days.
mfa.gracePeriodExpiredMessage: MFA setup grace period has expired. You must set up MFA to continue.
mfa.enforcedMessage: MFA is strictly required for your current request. Please set it up to proceed.
UserAccountLockedOut: This account has been locked out, please try again later.
PasswordExpired: Your password has expired. It must be changed every {0} days.
PasswordChangeTooSoon: You cannot change your password again so soon. Please wait at least {0} days.
CaptchaValidationFailed: CAPTCHA validation failed, please try again.
AbnormalLoginBlocked: Abnormal login detected and blocked. If you have questions, please contact the administrator.
NotImpersonating: You are not currently impersonating anyone.
UserAccountDeactivated: Your account has been deactivated. Please contact the administrator.
PersonNotActive: Your associated person record is not active. Please contact HR or the administrator.
PasswordRequirementsHelp: Use 8 or more characters with a mix of letters, numbers & symbols
Validation_PasswordMismatch: The password and confirmation password do not match
Validation_PasswordLength: Password must be at least {0} characters long
CookieConsent.Title: Cookies & Privacy
CookieConsent.Description: We only use essential cookies to maintain login and security. Non-essential cookies are only enabled with your consent. We do not use third-party analytics cookies.
EnterAuthenticatorCode: Enter the code from your authenticator app
EnterCodeOrRecoveryCode: Please enter a verification code or recovery code
PleaseWaitThenRetry: Please wait before requesting a new code
EnterEmailCodeDescription: We sent a verification code to your email
